actionTemplate.title: 3-tone concealer mixing for mild flaws
steps: Mix brightener with peach corrector to lift under-eye shadows.
Mix brightener with skin-tone concealer for nasolabial shadows and small blemishes.
Mix skin-tone concealer with a corrector to cover darker marks or redness.
Tap on with a small brush; build thin layers.
Blend edges with sponge for a skin-like finish.

rationaleTemplate: Simple mixes cover concerns without heavy layers.
Blending edges prevents a visible patch.
